column5: I'm thinking of hitting the Provincial Park in the last part of May or first part of June and looking for information on the lake. Hoping to catch some walleyes. Has anyone ever fished the lake and will it be worth the 12 hr drive? Any help will be appreciated. Thanks Mike
Lol Solo, you've been everywhere!!! I don't know how you managed it.Sorry for the derail.Cheers!

Don't worry about the derail he has been everywhere, a wealth of knowledge on the north. I think we should get him to write a guide book about his adventures and fishing, but then again some gems of fishing are best kept to yourself so they remain gems.
